How to Run Example Programs on Win32

Last Updated 09/26/03

Example programs are provided to show how to develop client applications and providers using the WBEM Services client and provider APIs. Example client programs can be found in the examples\client subdirectory where the WBEM Services executables are located. Example provider programs are found in subdirectory examples\provider. To run some of these example programs to illustrate how the client and provider APIs work, execute the run_examples script.

  • First start the CIMOM by following the directions found here.
  • Open a command window (DOS window).
  • Go to the directory containing the WBEM Services executables.
    • If you built the WBEM Services executables in c:\files\open, go to directory c:\files\open\dist\wbemservices\examples.
    • If you downloaded or copied the WBEM Services executables into c:\wbemservices, go to directory c:\wbemservices\examples
  • Run run_examples.bat. You will see the following: 
    c:>cd c:\files\open\dist\wbemservices\examples
c:\files\open\dist\wbemservices\examples>run_examples
USAGE: run_examples user passwd [protocol]
* protocol is rmi (the default) or http
c:\files\open\dist\wbemservices\examples>run_examples root root_passwd

*********************************************************
Creating EX_SFLProvider class
*********************************************************

*********************************************************
Adding MOF definitions to CIM Repository
*********************************************************
c:\j2sdk1.4.0-rc\bin\java -classpath .;c:\files\open\dist\wbemservices\bin\mofcomp.jar;c:\files\open\dist\wbemservices\cimom\lib\cimom.jar;c:\files\open\dist\wbemservices\lib\wbem.jar;c:\files\open\dist\wbemservices\cimom\bin\repository.jar org.wbemservices.wbem.compiler.mofc.CIM_Mofc -v -u root -p root_passwd EX_SFLProvider.mof
Adding class EX_SFLProvider
Compilation succeeded.

*********************************************************
Running ClientEnum on EX_SFLProvider over RMI
*********************************************************

c:\j2sdk1.4.0-rc\bin\java -classpath .;c:\files\open\dist\wbemservices\lib\wbem.jar ClientEnum localhost root root_passwd EX_SFLProvider RMI
    :
    : <more output>
    :

*********************************************************
Running DeleteClass on EX_Student over RMI
*********************************************************

c:\j2sdk1.4.0-rc\bin\java -classpath .;c:\files\open\dist\wbemservices\lib\wbem.jar DeleteClass localhost EX_Student root root_passwd RMI
  • run_examples.bat runs example programs to illustrate how some client APIs interact with the CIMOM. It also runs programs to illustrate how client APIs interact with example providers. In these cases, example classes are added to the CIM Repository as needed. These classes are later removed before run_examples.bat terminates. NOTE: The CIMOM will display harmless error messages when running run_examples.bat over HTTP.
